name: Park Regis Kris Kin Hotel
desc: Visit attractions and popular malls via ADCB metro station (1.5 km).Relax at the hotel's rooftop pool with stunning skyline views, sauna, hot tub and Jacuzzi.Savour Indian delicacies at the on-site Masala Bazaar restaurant.
location: An upscale property in Bur Dubai, Park Regis Kris Kin Hotel offers luxurious stays opposite Burjuman Mall and Burjuman Metro Station!

name: Fortune Grand Hotel
desc: It has a pool, hot tub and a nightclub for a fun-filled holiday.The hotel lies within 5 km of Dubai International Airport.The hotel’s multilingual staff is fluent in Hindi and Malayalam. Enjoy Indian food at in-house restaurants Padheyam, Ragini, and Sa Re Ga Ma.
location: Located on Omar Bin Khattab Road, Fortune Grand Hotel offers wellness facilities and comfortable stays.

name: Phoenix Park Inn by Radisson
desc: Take a refreshing dip in the outdoor swimming pool.Start your day with a refreshing workout session at the on-site fitness centre featuring state-of-the-art equipment.Satiate your palate with regional Goan dishes and mouth-watering international cuisines at the on-site restaurant, Chapora.
location: Lavish rooms, multiple dining spots, an outdoor swimming pool and a host of amenities await you for a delightful stay at this luxurious property.

name: Vivanta Goa, Panaji
desc: Features a full-service spa and a rooftop swimming pool for complete rejuvenation.Received the certification of “ISO 22K” for its quality food services.Arranges a romantic rooftop dinner with a 5-course gourmet meal and a fairytale setting.Houses award-winning restaurants serving exotic global flavours and handcrafted beverages.
location: An epitome of excellence and luxury, Vivanta Goa delivers a fine blend of contemporary accommodation and state-of-the-art facilities.
